page.title: 01SUMMARY OF THE AREA
page.content:
{1 Summary of area
Our survey area is situated in West Yorkshire.The area is a cross between the town and the country.Spen Beck runs through Cleckheaton which is the main town in our area. The M62 motorway and Hartshead Moor services can also be found there.The railway was once important but now the track is disused. In our area there are three primary schools three middle schools and one secondary school.The dye works and fibre glass companies are important local industries.There is a large housing estate called Windy Bank and a private estate called Hare Park.There are one or two recreation grounds as well as bowling and cricket clubs. Cleckheaton has a variety of shops and a beautiful park with a war memorial
